mapper.select: select DISTINCT province_name as provinceName from t_delaer_config_v2
select id,name,mobile,city_name as cityName,create_time createTime from t_road_active_v2_1 where 1 =1 and mobile = #{mobile} order by create_time desc limit #{pageSize},#{limit}
select count(id) from t_road_active_v2_1 where 1=1 and mobile = #{mobile}
select DISTINCT city_name as cityName from t_delaer_config_v2 where province_name = #{provinceName}
select dealer_name as dealerName,dealer_code as dealerCode from t_delaer_config_v2 where province_name = #{privinceName} and city_name = #{cityName}

select tra.name as name,tra.mobile as mobile,tdc.province_name as provinceName,tdc.city_name as cityName, tdc.delaer_sort_name as delaerSortName,tra.car_modal as carModal,tra.appoint_time as appointTime, tdc.area_code as areaCode,tdc.phone_num as phoneNum,tra.create_time as createTime from t_road_active_v2 tra left join t_delaer_config_v2 tdc on tra.dealer_code = tdc.dealer_code where 1 =1 and tra.mobile = #{mobile} order by tra.create_time desc
select name,mobile,city_name as cityName,create_time as createTime from t_road_active_v2_1 where 1 =1 and mobile = #{mobile} order by create_time desc

select tra.name as name,tra.mobile as mobile,tdc.province_name as provinceName,tdc.city_name as cityName, tdc.dealer_code as dealerCode,tdc.delaer_adress as delaerAdress,tra.car_modal as carModal,tra.appoint_time as appointTime, tdc.area_code as areaCode,tdc.phone_num as phoneNum,tdc.delaer_sort_name as delaerSortName,tra.create_time as createTime from t_road_active_v2 tra left join t_delaer_config_v2 tdc on tra.dealer_code = tdc.dealer_code where 1 =1 and tra.mobile = #{mobile} order by tra.create_time desc limit #{pageSize},#{limit}
select count(id) from t_road_active_v2 where 1=1 and mobile = #{mobile}

select tra.name as name,tra.mobile as mobile,tdc.province_name as provinceName,tdc.city_name as cityName, tdc.dealer_code as dealerCode,tdc.delaer_adress as delaerAdress,tra.car_modal as carModal,tra.appoint_time as appointTime, tdc.area_code as areaCode,tdc.phone_num as phoneNum,tdc.delaer_sort_name as delaerSortName from t_road_active_v2 tra left join t_delaer_config_v2 tdc on tra.dealer_code = tdc.dealer_code where tra.mobile = #{mobile}
select id,name,mobile,city_name as cityName from t_road_active_v2_1 where mobile = #{mobile}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_road_active_v2 SET name =#{name}, mobile = #{mobile} ,province_name = #{provinceName} ,dealer_code=#{dealerCode} ,city_name = #{cityName} ,car_modal=#{carModal} ,appoint_time=#{appointTime} ,modify_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
